plot: A motion picture about cloud collecting. Two young scientists, Beliveau and LaFontaine, battle for the love of a beautiful woman as the world awaits the first launch of their sky balloons.
title: Neptunus Rex
plot_es: A motion picture about cloud collecting. Two young scientists, Beliveau and LaFontaine, battle for the love of a beautiful woman as the world awaits the first launch of their sky balloons.
plot_en: A motion picture about cloud collecting. Two young scientists, Beliveau and LaFontaine, battle for the love of a beautiful woman as the world awaits the first launch of their sky balloons.
